actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: Expressing support for designation of a "Hear My Cry Day" in schools across the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the House of Representatives' support for a Hear My Cry Day in schools across this country to encourage the elimination of bullying from our schools. Encourages school children across the country to recite a pledge against bullying that will be administered by President Barack Obama and Secretary of Education Arne Duncan at noon on that day.

titles.title: Expressing support for designation of a "Hear My Cry Day" in schools across the United States.
